column4: who knows a good bash scripting tutorial for a nine year old who is Really smart
one moment, I have one in my favourites

it's written quite well (by a non-English speaker, so a few words are spelled strangely, but the commands are correct). I've never gone all the way through it -just used it as a reference now and then. IME, it's pretty comprehensive and fairly easy to understand, even without a huge background in *nix
